Name: Save the Queen
About the game: PRESENTATION Save the Queen is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of Midnight's Blessing and Vagrant Hearts. FEATURES Exciting and fast paced storyline Beautiful aesthetics Intimidating and menacing dungeons to explore Mouse Support Quest Journal to keep track of your progress SUMMARY The Skull King has risen once more, determined to transform the whole word in the likeness of his own, the Shadow Lands, he is set on bringing chaos and destruction. Waging war against him is the Princess Noomi and her fellow companions. As the last bastion against evil, it is your duty to stop the Skull King and restore the country to it's peaceful form.
